英文公告.附加說明: TPC will install two(2) sets of Oil-Fired Gas Turbine, around 60MW(Iso.Rating), or three(3) sets of Oil-Rired Gas Turbine, around 40MW(Iso.Rating), located in the original planned black start Gas Turbines site. These two(2) or three(3) Gas Turbines can provide standby power to non safety related 4.16kv Buses on loss of offsite power, as well as safety related buses during station black out perid, and can be connected in paralleled with the grid when typhoon is closing to the site. TPC will proceed to the said Gas Turbines Task by EPC package approaches and try to target this task before the middle of March, 2013. TPC will invite A/E companies for bidding to perform the engineering services for planning, design, layout, assistant bidding, procurement, supervising, etc. for the said Gas Turbine EPC task.Work scope of Gas Turbine A/E as followings:1. General Work.2. Engineering Study and Planning.3. EPC Specificaton Preparation.4. Engineering Design.5. Contract Management.6. Test Witness.7. Optional Services (The budget is not covered in this Project, but would be negotiated if necessary in the future)Note: The Bidder's Proposal of pricing shall follow the Bidder Pricing Sheet as in the Specification.
